title: Dusk dialogue at end of passage

content.question: The primary effect of the dialogue at the end of the passage is to

choices.label: heighten the dramatic impact of a memory
introduce a digression on a past relationship
provide a glimpse of a childhood experience

content.answer: heighten the dramatic impact of a memory

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain the function of a particular sequence of events in a plot.
